articles.title: Mom arrested after her baby, toddler found dead, strapped into their car seats
articles.description: Evidence at the scene in a historic mining east of Phoenix, indicated foul play, according to the Pinal County Sheriff's Office.

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Uriel J. Garcia, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: Sheriff's Office: Children found dead in Superior were left in car for several hours
articles.description: Two children found dead in a car in Superior had been left there for several hours, according to a Pinal County Sheriff's Office report.

articles.author: The Arizona Republic, Uriel J. Garcia, The Arizona Republic
articles.title: Baby, toddler found dead in Arizona were left in car for several hours, sheriff's report says
articles.description: Two children found dead in a car in Superior, Ariz., had been left there for several hours, according to a Pinal County Sheriff's Office report.

articles.title: Man arrested in killing of grandmother in Maricopa
articles.description: Marcos Martinez, 23, was arrested on Tuesday on suspicion of killing his grandmother, Maricopa police said.

articles.title: Horrific tale of Eva Dugan caused Arizona to change death by hanging
articles.description: Convicted murderer Eva Dugan was the last inmate executed by hanging in Arizona after she was decapitated by accident.

articles.title: Arizona officers under scrutiny at one agency often move to others

articles.author: The Republic | azcentral.com, Uriel J. Garcia, The Republic | azcentral.com
articles.title: 3 decades after Chandler mom goes missing, her husband is charged in her murder. Why now?
articles.description: More than 30 years ago, Donna Mae Jokumsen asked her father to ask if she and her sons could seek refuge at his home. She never made it to Washington.
